Description: Limestone ostracon containing biblical text (I Sam 16.4-5) written in Coptic.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Deir el-Bahri (Thebes), Monastery of Phoibmmon
Bibliographic references: Godlewski 1986 / Le monastère de St Phoibammon (p.153)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390731) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390731)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
